inclusion.criterion: Mild-to-moderate CLN3 disease documented by UBDRS
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participant can independently walk for a distance of at least 20 feet
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Participant can tolerate swallowing oral medication or have a gastric/jejunostomy tube
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Participant has clinically documented generalized motor status epilepticus within 4 weeks of Baseline visit
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 32-year-old obese woman who came to the clinic with weight concerns. She is complaining of sleep apnea, PCO and dissatisfaction with her body shape.
